1.content: Now where are we in this area?
1.title: To begin

choices: Staff (such as a janitor or clerk)
11.title: University

choices: Top Brass (such as a dean, the president, or department head)
111.content: Now who are you this time?
111.title: Head Faculty

1112.content:
Who are you once more?

Jubilee Darrieux
In-coming teacher of the new French language department, Jubilee has gotten a reputation as being the sunniest woman ever known in recent memory. She's optimistic, she bright, she possess a sharp wit. What's else can be said about the woman, well, she does have a knack for finding herself in places she isn't supposed to be. That isn't going to be a problem...right?

Coach Ava L. Laurence
Head of the school's woman's soccer league, Ava is a gruff whistle-blower. Third daughter of the town's largest meatpacking facility owner, Ava's suffers a stigma that her position was caused by nepotism. Make no mistake though, she runs a tight ship on her team.
1112.title: Teacher

1121.content:
Maya Kammie
Born and having lived her entire life in Great Tracts, Maya has gotten used to the various different sizes and bodies of people within the city as well as the various problems that some people can have due to differences in size or weight. Already standing pretty tall at 9 feet and only growing, Maya has done some growing already due to her house being very close to a chemical plant, but she is taking her slow growth in stride rather than freaking out about it.

Joy Heather
A rather minuscule woman standing at a mere 3'0", Joy Heather is one of the shortest women to enroll within Great Tracts University, taking a major in cooking. Enjoying the growth in others, Joy has been studying the growth of others so she could try in learning how she can make others grow from simply using meals, so she can have all the enjoyment in watching others grow, while also trying to figure out a way to reverse said growth in case someone would get... too big.
1121.title: Freshmen

1123.content: What about Junior or Senior?
1123.title: Other Age

11231.content:
The Carter Twins
Currently attending "exquisitely contained" classes,the Carter Twins were known troublemakers of the school. Playing pranks on others and being a genuine hassle. The three main reasons that they were never expelled were:
1. They had pretty good grades.
2.Their father is the mayor's secretary
3.They've never been officially caught.
Something did seemed to have happened over the summer though and the Carter Twins seemed changed. What with wearing very baggy clothing at all times now. Their names are Jenna and Molly; one dyes her hair blonde while the other still has her natural raven locks.

Sharon Whit
A STEM student, Sharon's current endeavor is investigating the town's strange people. She feels she's on the precipice of discovery though she may soon come across more than she bargained for in that regards. She's farsighted and so most of the time her glasses sit on the top of her mousy brown hair. She favors sweaters and skirts mashups for her usual attire.
11231.title: Junior

12.content:
The town as previously stated is a perfect blend of cool forests and nice river beaches, a perfect place to start raising a family if you want them to become nice people in the future. But where in this peaceful yet strange little town do we want to start off in?

Hospital: the towns only medical practice that is fully equipped to help deal and possibly treat some of the weird mishaps that tend to happen to people.

Evergreen Forest: one of the calmest and most beautiful forests in the entire region and their calming atmosphere make it a perfect camp grounds and hiking destinations. However, they say strange things happen within these woods.

Restaurant District: This single district contains a number of restaurants that seem to always be a hotspot with strange activity such as a food item gone bad or a dish causing something strange within its patron, either way, no one can really stay away from these places for long.

Chemical Plant: A defunct chemical plant that used to be the heart of this town till it shut down. While no one goes there, the chemicals inside still remain and sometimes leak out.

And many more places such as these.
12.title: Town

121.content: Now who do we follow?
121.title: Hospital

1213.content:
Alright, now who is our patient here?

Carla Wickman
The owner of the town's fitness center, Carla is a sporty tomboy who'll do what she can to whip others into shape. Normally, the staff of the hospital would only be seeing her teaching fitness classes, but today she's in as a patient with a very odd problem: she woke up this morning to discover her breasts had grown dramatically, and she's now having serious back pain because of it.

Toby Hadley
One of the town's mechanics, Toby is an absolutely expert in all things car. If it's engine trouble, brake issues, or problems with the wheels, Toby's the guy to talk to. So why's he here? He hit his thumb with a hammer... and instead of bleeding, the thumb went completely flat.
1213.title: Patient

122.content:
Michael Marrow
A camp guide to the Evergreen Forest, Michael Marrow has learned all about the various different kinds of wildlife within the Evergreen Forest, giving him careful knowledge on how to survive within the forest. He gives out tours throughout the summer to people who wish to explore nature, but he is not in charge of any changes caused by the Forest. He stands out at 6’0” and has dark brown hair.

Bella Belle
A rather bizarre woman with long green hair who lives at the very center of the Evergreen Forest, living among nature and only rarely comes out to the main city to occasionally stock up on food. She claims to be a nature spirit, but aside from flowers blooming wherever she walks, nobody has been able to approve or deny this. She has a vested interest in protecting the Forest, but thanks to the weird nature of the Forest her body is prone to changing in size constantly, from being a giant to being merely a foot tall.
122.title: Evergreen Forest

choices: "Sorry, can't. Too busy cleaning the forest..."
Something interrupts Bella before she can answer.
1222.content:
In the outskirts of the city of Great Tracts lies the Evergreen Forest, a expanse of wildlife and trees that has been used for camping destinations by people all across the city. However, despite the niceness of the woods, contamination from both the common tourist leaving garbage as well as the abandoned chemical plants has warped the wildlife within, giving them weird properties that can change the bodies of those who enter if they are not careful.

Normally, because of this, most people do not choose to live in these woods. However, in the center of these woods lives a certain woman, all by her lonesome...

"Hmph... another human has left trash in these woods... why do I have to always clean it up..."

Picking up another plastic bottle would be a green-haired woman with pointed ears by the name of Bella Belle, who at the time was only standing at a mere 1'0", requiring her to use both hands to carry it above her head. She had found her size to wildly fluctuate over time, and as of now she was was on the shorter end of her usual size, which she did not prefer due to it making her job harder.

"It's days like this that make me wish I had direct control over my size..."

Slowly carrying the plastic bottle out of the depths of the forest, Bella would eventually climb up a bench in order to reach a garbage can, before throwing in the bottle and watching it land in the garbage can. As she would hop back onto the ground though, the woman would hear a ringing from her phone, and as the woman would pull it out, she would check out who was calling.

"Hey It's Bella, what do you want?"

"Yo Bella, it's me Trisha! Wanted to ask if you wanted to come with me to the public pool with me today, They're offering a discount today and I thought you could relief some stress by swimming..."

Upon realizing who was on the other end, Bella would sigh heavily as she thought about Trisha. She was one of her few friends outside of the Evergreen Forest, but she seemed to stay consistently at a 7'0" height while she herself has changed in height with every visit. However, she had never really shown up below 5 feet to Trisha, which worried her a bit on what she would think if she saw her that small.

"So, you coming or no?"
1222.title: Bella Belle

125.content:
Blue Hills Cemetery and Morgue-One of the spookiest and most morbid place in the town. Blue Hills is around seventy-five acres of land for those dearly departed. Blues Hills Morgue also contains a small stone mason hut for on premises grave markers.

Harriet's Hairdressers-The place for all things hair. Started by Marry Harriet, her great-granddaughter Merry Harriet and her brother Greg Harriet now run the store. Fourteen dressers,stylists,and barbers work 10 to 6; 5 out of 7.
125.title: More places

1251.content:
Tina White: The White family has owned the Blue Hills for generation and it has now fallen to Tina, the current matriarch.She intentionally takes a goth look to her since she thinks it's appropriate for her job, but is still a warm and friendly person.

General Age:32


Jacquelin "Jack" Hawksly. An only child, Jack was always a tomboy growing up. She was in most school sports, gained a love of comics and video games, and went to Great Tracts with intentions of being a engineer.

And for God's knows what reason,ended up as the stonemason for gravemarkers.

Though what many people don't know is her body's very...flexible to put it bluntly.

General Age:28
1251.title: Blue Hills Cemetery and Morgue

choices: Jack gets back to her stonemasonry
12512.content:
"Who brought these flowers here?" Jack asked in annoyance. She stayed fifteen feet away from the mix of daffodils and daisies.Shane looked over at the cemetary's stone mason with half-lidded eyes.

"Oh yeah, forgot you're allergic to them, hang on." He spoke. With a few quick steps, the small man picked the flowers up from the front desk and put them into the back room. He came back and dusted his hands off.

"Why don't you wear a mask?" Shane questioned Jack as she hesitantly came over. She kept a hand over her mouth and nose for a few moments until she knew she was okay.

"Then nobody can see my winning smile." She joked. "Anyways Shane, I got the Gilligan's angel out in shop. Get the 'three stooges' to lift it over to them."

"You know they hate that name."

"And are they here right now? No. Then they never heard me use right now."

Shane gave her a half-grin and opened his palm up, with that action, Jack handed over a slip. Shane placed it into a box marked 'to the boss' right before he handed an envelope to Jack.

"You know the drill. Pictures of what they want and other parameters are in it." Shane waved her off as Jack walked back to her quarters.

She looked around for a few moments before she stretched her arm out like a hookline and grabbed a hold of a nearby fence post. With a soft 'whee' from her mouth, Jack shot forward like a bullet.

She landed with a thud she landed on the soft grass, barely feeling a thing, Jack lengthed her legs to run forth back to her section.

The tomboy was never born with these powers, an accident involving some tainted coke had given Jack the ability to stretch like Mr.Fantastic. It also aggravated her already existing allergies to the extreme. After this accident Jhad thought she was a freak,but she soon encountered others. Great Tract's seemingly kept its population of weirdos on the downlow,even though two-thirds of the younger folk in town suffered great life-changing conditions.

"Heck my two best friends have a rack that a supermodel would envy and the inflates like a sponge when she hits water." Jack mused.
12512.title: Jacquelin "Jack" Hawksly

125121.content:
Returning to her workshop, or as she liked to call it the "quarry", Jack sat at her main desk and opened the envelope with her next order on it.

The pictures in the envelope showed a slate of marble and a sketch of an open book. Behind them was a note with what the customer wanted the epitaph to say. The note read: "Martin Albert Windlemon. Beloved Grandfather and Librarian. June 7th, 1944 - August 8th, 2020."

"Rest in Piece, Marty." Jack said to herself. "Whole town's gonna miss ya."

Setting the pictures and note down, Jack went over to what she liked to call her "mine", the storage area where she kept stones that would soon be shaped into headstones.

Stonemasonry hadn't been Jack's first choice of job. She had wanted to be an engineer, but took multiple classes to cover her bases in case that didn't work. Sure enough, it didn't. Jack's stonemasonry classes, though, came into use when the original Stonemason of Blue Hills Cemetery retired. And thus, here she was.

Her rubber powers actually were quite helpful here too. Stretching her arms, she wrapped them around a large piece of marble, and lifted with all her might. She was slightly stronger, but not by much. Lugging the piece of rock out of the "mine", Jack set in on her reinforced work station, grabbed her chisel, made her hand grow large, and got to work on shaping the stone.

She got about part way through when she heard the door to her workshop open. She was about to shrink her hand down until she heard a voice.

"Hey Jack! You in here?" The voice yelled. A voice belonging to one of the only two people who knew about Jack's secret power. That person was...
125121.title: Worktime

choices: Yuki and Jack talk for awhile
Someone absentmindedly walks in on their meeting.
1251211.content:
Yuki.

She would've been quite a petite Japanese woman, if one didn't count the bazongas on her chest. They took up the entire view of her chest and if she was any shorter, than she'd would've been quite reminiscent of a certain anime character.

The woman used to keep her hair in almost flowing locks, but she seemed to cut it quite short this month. It was done in a generic, Japanese bob-cut. A melon pin was tied in her hair, either out of irony or general love of the fruit.

"Ciao~ Jackie!" Yuki called out. Jack stretched out her hand to give her friend a handshake. Her boobs jiggled in enthusiastic shaking.
------

Yuki was another of the town's weirdos that somehow stayed hidden away from public eye. The stonemason had discovered the woman one lonely night, which in turn allowed Jack to discover she wasn't freak in town.

Yuki's story was quite different than Jack's though. Working for Mrs.Abernathy, the town's largest--in more ways than one--debutante,Yuki felt a subtle envy for the other workers there. Who seemed to also suffer the town's weird affliction. Yuki,being the only normal person there,decided to join the in-crowd.

"I only wanted them to get a smidge bigger." Yuki told the stretcher.

Finding a doctor who wasn't a few days drive out of town, Yuki expected him to give her bust a nice boob job. Instead, she received knockers half her size. She of course complained to the man, who told her she needed the funds for their removal. Already out of cash for the first operation, Yuki did her best to scrounge up more for her second.
-------

"I don't think that's hello." Jack told the Japanese woman.

"I think it is." Yuki replied with a slight shrug. The woman still kept her sunny attitude despite the fact her back regularly suffered soreness or the fact she needed to do all of her shopping at specialty stores,at night.
1251211.title: ...Yuki.

choices: "...my mother's coming to visit, and I need moral support."
"...I found a manga you might like."
12512111.content:
"So, how's the money savin' going?" Jack asked as she began picking away at the marble again.

"Slow." Yuki replied. "But I'm getting there. Though at the rate I'm going, I'll probably be stuck with these monsters for life. It'd be so nice to be out in public again."

"Yeah, I'd love to show off my powers in public, but I get the feeling people would freak." Jack replied. "You'd think all these changes would be more out in the open, but nope.

Yuki shrugged, and pulled her cell phone out of her cleavage. "Well, at least I have some extra carrying space." She said.

Jack looked back at Yuki. Yuki's massive bust filled up her entire lap when sitting, and came up to her chin. Though heavy, they kept a perfectly round shape thanks to the implants. While she knew Yuki's issues with them, Jack did love the sight.

Jack had gained a love of huge breasts in college. She had no interest in sex or romance at all, but there was just something about giant boobs she liked. In her off-time, she browsed the internet for stories of huge breasts.

"Anyway, that's not why I came here." Yuki said. "I actually wanted to see if you wanted to come over to my house after work."

"What for?" Jack asked, turning back to the stone.

Yuki smiled. "Well..."
12512111.title: A Friendly Chat

choices: Things go to more personal topics.
Jack finishes what she can for the day before she hides
125121111.content:
"...it's "Shitty Movie" Night."

Jack head did a 180 as she worked on her piece of stone.

"Tonight? Really?" She asked. Meanwhile her hands searched the workshop for her tools. With the advent of her powers, Jack had significantly changed how she decorated anywhere she lived or worked. Tools could be grabbed with barely any mishaps,either they were attached to easily openable locks or just laying in neat molds.

"Yep. I've invited Jess as well as Miranda and Kim and Scotty." Yuki said,she stretched a little,which showed off her great big boobs. "Damn back."

Her breasts were actually lighter than one would've expected, though physics still took a hold on Yuki's small frame. The Japanese woman scratched a little at her side. Jack grimaced in empathy.

"I barely know those last three." Jack spoke. "What's their deal?"

"Well Miranda's somewhat taller than most girls." Yuki shuffled a bit to make her sore back feel better. "Kim's quite...big headed. And well Scotty's suffers anger issues."

Jack internalized each of Yuki's words. "Wait, how does that.."

"You'll see at the meeting." Yuki interrupted her friend's question.
125121111.title: Shitty Movie Night, tonight

choices: ...only Jess, the others hadn't arrived yet.
1251211112.content:
"Well, I'd better get home. I think you have a tombstone to finish, and I gotta get ready for tonight. I've got some real shitty films for us to watch. See you tonight." Yuki said. With that, she turned and walked out of Jack's workstations, her boobs bouncing the whole time.

Jack smiled, before turning back to the tombstone. She'd gotten part of it finished, and she hoped to have at least half of it done before she had to leave. Thankfully, since she had a policy that she needed at least a week to finish a tombstone, she had plenty of time. So, she got back to work, chipping away at the stone.
---------
After a few hours, Jack had indeed managed to get half of the stone shaped into an open book, but it was time to close shop. Setting her tools aside, she left her workshop and locked it. Looking around to make sure no one was watching, she stretched her arm like a grapple, latched onto a nearby tree, and took off.

It only took Jack a few minutes to reach Yuki's house, bounding across the rooftops. Thankfully, she managed to avoid other people. Landing right in front of Yuki's door, she was about to knock before it swung open. Yuki was on the other side.

"Rooftops again?" Yuki asked. "Someone's going to see you eventually, you know."

"Not the route I take." Jack said. She looked behind Yuki into her living room, and saw...
1251211112.title: Ending the Work Day

choices: Yuki tells the girl the movie.
12512111122.content:
Jess who was sitting down on the couch. Underneath her shirt and pants was her signature wetsuit. It was a full body shield against most liquids.

The covered woman got up and walked over to Jack with a small smile. She overshadowed the girl by about six inches in height.

"Jacq-Lin, pleasant to see you again." Her almost siren-like voice spoke. If she was attracted to women, Jack would've taken the voice right at that moment.

"You to Jess. We've each other in forever."

"It's only been two days." Jess replied. Her head did that weird bob that Jack teased her about. Yuki hastily pushed Jack inside and closed the door.

"So what's with the suit? Its not going to rain until Sunday." Jack questioned Jess as they walked over to the couch.

"You never know, Jacq-Lin, you never know." Jess replied. Her hands fidgeted together.

----

Jess' story was tragic,well not too melancholic anyways. Once a lover of the town's lakes, something scratched the woman's thigh when she was eighteen years old. Which showed its effects far too quickly for her liking. It was only through a large tide did she managed to get back to shore. Naked mind you, but at least she wasn't growing until she'd explode.

Packing up her things, the once water faring lass moved into her late Uncle's cabin to escape from any large bodies of water.
12512111122.title: Only Jess is here.

125121111222.content:
Jack and Jess were sitting on the couch, while Yuki was sitting in a recliner made specifically to fit her bust. In her hand was a DVD.
"OK, this movie's gotten review scores that can be counted in the single digits." Yuki said. "It's called 'Night of the Buxom Demons'."

"Where the hell'd you find a movie called that?" Jess asked.

"Thrift store. Saw the title and knew it'd be up Jack's alley." Yuki teased.

"Haha." Jack replied. "So, what's the deal with the film?"

"It's about a witch who makes a deal with a really busty succubus to get revenge on her ex-boyfriend. The succubus turns most of the towns women into huge-boobed, brainwashed minions, and now the ex-boyfriend has to work with his current girlfriend to stop all this." Yuki explained.

"Who comes up with this crap?" Jack asked. "What makes the movie shit? That is the whole point of tonight."

"Oh, you have no idea." Yuki replied. "Awful acting, ugly set designs, plot holes you can drive a submarine through, and characters dumber then hammers. Only thing it has going for it are the boob effects."

"Sounds horrible!" Jess said. "This'll be fun!"

Jack was just about to reply when she heard the doorbell ring. Yuki got up to see who it was. On the other side of the door was...
125121111222.title: Night of the Buxom Demons

12513.content:
Clarissa Dirge. (Goth-Like character. Less so than the owner of this cemetery.)
Age: 26.
Figure:a tiny bit chubby
Personal Ideas:both men and women, she's not a super-famous artist, but she makes enough to get by, spends her weekends at Blue Hill.
12513.title: Other Morbid Characters.

125131.content:
Clarissa could feel the night's air touch her skin in quite a delectable way. The goth girl loved it though with every fiber of her being.Her little fat belly jiggled under her grey T-shirt which depicted a skull moon.

"Now let's get my creative juices flowing into my old brain box." She announced. Clarissa found a nice mound to sit down and stare outwards towards the dark hills and the grey stones. She licked her lips in anticipation of what she would draw during the next hour or so.The young woman was unaware of the invisible presence that watched over her.

"And I shoved Jim off in a flash!" Virginia said to her friend Bea. The two hovered over Clarissa among a group of others, the reason they could hover was because of the one fact that they were ghosts. Some weird quality of Blue Hills allowed the dead to congregate together every night.

That wasn't the only thing though, it seemed that the town's strange properties had always been afflicting the land. Many of the ghosts possessed limbs or heights or bodies of quite surreal proportions. One ghost seemed flat as a board while another had a head like a bobbing toy. Some had large lips and others had large manhoods.

Virginia had some of this going on as well with large hips and a boulder ass, they stretched the little black dress she wore. She was among the largest,though not the largest,of her category. Her friend Bea,who wasn't one these strange figures, looked miniscule do to how much area Virginia covered.

"Get outta here, Ginny." Bea said.

"No,no I'll show you how I did it." Virginia said. She floated down to Clarissa. With a small dance, she smashed her fat hip into the woman. A vortex appeared around Virginia which sucked her into Clarissa.

The woman,in turn, shivered like she was in a snowstorm.

"What was that?" She asked.
125131.title: Clarissa Dirge

choices: Larry's Hybrid Drive-Thru Movie and Sit-in Theater
1253.content:
Farshine District:
Contains the Great Tract's High School, suburbs, and stadium.

Larry's Hybrid Drive-thru movie and sit-in theater!
Exactly what it says, it's been a town staple since the 60's.
1253.title: Other Places III

12531.content:
Lannie Mckinnely-
Age:21
A rather reclusive woman, Lannie is known around her suburb as "the kooky lady whose somewhat nice." No matter the weather,she keeps herself dressed under several layers of clothing. Many have noted how hot it must be under there, but none have said anything to her face yet.

Sharon Tate:
Age:22
The local recreational manager, Sharon is known to be quite friendly and very health conscious. One thing to note is her prescribed pills she takes after every meal,no one knows their purpose.
12531.title: Farshine District

12533.content:
K.P Morgan's Family Store(sometimes called Morgan's Store):
An 85,000 sq feet store, K.P Morgan's has been one of the few stores left in town that isn't a franchise. Passed down from K.P Morgan to his granddaughter K.D Morgan, the store has prospered in modern time and has yet to slow down. Not only through their friendly employees, but through one section which brings many people together. A section devoted entirely to strange and exotic food stuffs that other places dare not to own.

Jill's Carpets:
Just what it says,a normal carpet store. Just a normal carpet store. Normal.
12533.title: Other Places IV

15.content: This will be for miscellaneous adventures or certain events that concern a Great Tracts citizen.
15.title: Events/Misc

151.content: So what shall it be?
151.title: Holidays

1511.content: So what shall it be?
1511.title: Halloween

choices: It opens on a gothic castle
It opens in on a village
15111.content:
"I am generally surprised that there is still a movie store with physical discs around this county." Missy spoke aloud to no one in particular. It was just to give sound into a silent store. The rainstorm outside with the wind howling was not a comforting sound. So Missy, who got off in about three hours, did her best to occupy herself within the store.

Converted from a 1830's townhouse, 'The House of the Hill' DVD/Tape store was one of the town's local landmarks.Somehow still being able to bring in more than enough folks to keep the business afloat.Normally very comly, the outside weather made it the darkness of some parts look like the emptiness of space.The interior had become quite foreboding, certain areas had faulty wiring which caused the lights to flicker or caused strange noises to occur.

Missy occupied herself by reorganizing the basement, where all the old videos were. From DVDs to cassettes to tapes, it always seemed that somebody in town wanted to buy from here. Ironically the deep basement was one of the less terrifying parts of the old house. With actual lights that were still on and a small boombox to hear music on. On her butt, Missy piled together movies into their respective genres before she categorized that into what technology they were made for.

"After this, I may try to do the attic." Missy said to herself once more.She then remembered the strange memorabilia up there and decided against it.

She had come into town a little over a month ago and took her job in the store two days before this point. The brunette with a ponytail was slowly becoming more accustomed to her job though she still found certain peculiarities of the place. For one, she was told never to question the people who came in with gigantic clothing, like coats or skirts or even at one time a wetsuit. The other thing she was told was to never question the contents of the four red box in the basement. Not because it was weird, but because it contained...quite lewd material.

Missy had already saw the cover of one of the videos and she had turned a bright red. So the woman vowed never to do so again unless told.

"All right I think I got the horror section done now lets....wait,what's this?" Missy spoke. She picked up a blocky tape and looked at the cover. On it was a supermodel looking woman with red lips, red hair,and green eyes. The only conservative part of herself was the oldstyle puritan hat she wore. Everything below was longcoat that flashed a bodysuit that was just three pieces away from becoming a bikini.

Comedically, the woman wore one of the most determined expression Missy had ever seen on a woman's face. She scratched her head in thought.

"Van Helsing's Horror Pack" Missy said. "Includes:The Fullest Moon,The Blue Lagoon's Deeps, Countess Dracuela, Frakenstein's Wife,Ms Jekyll and Miss.Hyde,The Invisible Woman, Haunting of the Manor,Mummies,and The Phantasm of the Opera."

She flipped it around to stare at the back. Images showed scenes from what appeared to be a Hammer film,with its signature grainery appearance of the 1930's to 50's. But a woman so lewdly dressed would probably never fly during those days,so what was this?

Curiosity getting the better of her,Missy went over to the TV that was placed down in the basement-so that clients could see if their disc or tape still worked-and plopped it inside. She went through all the motions until she eventually saw the opening screen.
15111.title: Halloween(2020)

choices: Van Helsing goes and meets the occupants of the town/courtyard
151111.content:
Missy watched the credit crawl and waited for the opening scene. Almost as if it was a stronger mirror of the outside world, the land of wherever the setting was located was currently going through a deluge.Floods came crashing through the forest's trees. The moon's silver beams were the only lighting in the entire place,though that was soon eclipsed by the shining lights of a carriage's lantern. It's lights pierced the water fog and the shadowed forest it drove through.

"We're almost there Miss." The driver, a deep voiced man, spoke to whomever was the current occupant of the carriage. The horses whined in distress from the rain,yet still they continued onwards. Soon the shot of an old, gothic castle came into view. The carriage was dwarfed by the size. Even with barely any knowledge of architecture, Missy noted how utterly absurd the size was. The entire thing was more of Versailles palace than a gothic stronghold.

Still it drove through the foreboding gates, inside the courtyard or was it stadium field, were small houses and taverns. Some folks were watching the rain pour down, while others watched their children play in said rain. One or two looked towards the carriage,but none seemed to deem the vehicle any note.

Once it stopped the doors to the carriage slowly creaked open to reveal the titular Van Helsing. Who was still clad in her almost-bikini. Yet this didn't stop her slow strut outside.

"Thank you dear driver." She spoke to the man. The torrent seemingly not muting her own voice.

"Your welcome Professor,I'll be hitching the horses then." He replied.With that, he drove off, leaving the scandalously dressed woman alone.Her attire was so out of place compared to the 18th century peasants, that Missy softly chuckled in response.
151111.title: It opens on a gothic castle

choices: The door opens, revealing the Countess.
1511111.content:
The scene faded to the inside of the courtyard, with a small group of people walking about. Van Helsing walked through this small group, who regarded her with suspicion. Missy assumed it was because she was a stranger, but Missy still couldn't help but notice the complete disconnect between the normal 18th century outfits, and Van Helsing's scandalous outfit.

Eventually, Van Helsing entered what looked like a tavern filled with people. The owner, a burly man with a large beard, only briefly looked up from the bar-top, before returning to cleaning it. Van Helsing walked up to the bar, and sat down. The owner looked up again, and grunted.

"What'll it be, miss?" The owner asked.

"Information." Van Helsing replied. "I want to know all there is to know about the Countess."

All the sound in the tavern died as everyone stared at Van Helsing. Some looked afraid, others angry.

"Lady, you want no business with the Countess." One of the bar patrons said.

"Oh, and why is that?" Van Helsing asked. She was met with silence.

"Listen to me, lady." The bar owner said. "The Countess is not a person to trifle with. No one in the village dare go near her castle. If ye really want to go to her, though, take this." He then pulled out a wooden stake from behind the counter. "A stake of Hawthorn wood."

Van Helsing looked at the stake, before taking it. She simply nodded before leaving the tavern. She then opened her longcoat and put the stake in a pouch next to three others of the same kind.

"Smart girl." Missy muttered.

The scene then faded into the entrance of the castle. Van Helsing used the large gargoyle knocker on the door.
1511111.title: A Vague Warning

choices: They head into the Envy wing to discuss the Countess' problems.
15111111.content:
"Oh hello!" A woman's voice spoke from behind the iron door. Mixed in with that were the sounds of some sort of party going on. A creak of the iron doors made Van Helsing step back a little. A small, round and cute face peaked from the crack. Brunette hair tied into a neat bun with a general demeanor of joyful service. The personality one got if they'd served someone for many years without barely a peep of disagreement.

"Who might you be?" The servant politely inquired. Van Helsing coughed and answered.

"Van Helsing. Professor Sarah Van Helsing; PhD and all the other alphabets in the English language. I'm here to see your mistress, there has been rumors of a dark force on your lands. May I come in?"

The small brunette looked at Sarah for a moment before she nodded and smiled. She pushed the door open, which was surprising given how heavy it looked,so the Dutch woman could go inside.Van Helsing stepped in,around the front area of the castle were fifteen or so people speaking with one another. Elsewhere she could hear the faint echoes of a more...rambunctious party going on in the castle. Whether it was from the east of her or the west, Van Helsing could not say.

"My lady's annual party." The brunette stated. "She loves to host events that run the line between scandalous and formal,almost like a reflection of herself.I almost forgot:R.M Renfield at your service."

Renfield bowed to Van Helsing, who nodded in turn. She scanned the area to see the figures around her, the professor saw how different yet unified they were all dressed. They wore masks of animals, though they seem to stop at around seven different beasts. Those being:the cow, the raven, the goat,the lion, the pig,the mule,and the boar.

The guests clothes also seemed to be quite chaotic, but if one looked a little closer, could see a unifying color scheme. Pieces of red,yellow,green,purple,blue,brown,or orange.

"Interesting concept." Van Helsing noted. Renfield puckered her lips in thought until she realized what Van Helsing was referring to.

"Ah yes,each of those animals and colors are references to the mortal sins that men can enact.The front area of this abode is a lobby for rest. The rest of the wings are devoted towards the pleasures that each sin carries,all except my lady's tower that is, though some do get to explore it."

"And hopefully you'll shall see it too Ms.Van Helsing." A voice said. Van Helsing turned to her left and saw what was quite possibly the most ridiculous thing she had ever seen.

Missy stared open mouth at the incoming figure.

She was ethereal beauty with raven hair done short, yet alluring. Her skin was pale to the point where in some of the lighting she seemed almost blue. Her face had just the right amount of exoctisicm where one could only tell she came from the eurasian connected continent.

Yet these weren't her most eyecatching pieces, instead both Van Helsing and Missy were drawn towards the count's bulbous breasts. They were practically stuffed into a little black dress, which would've been quite beautiful on the woman, if she didn't possess her pair of bazongas. They covered her entire upper chest and reached almost as wide as her shoulders. Gold trimmings were located around her cleavage as though they weren't noticeable enough.

"My Countess Draculei." Renfield spoke in a hasty tone and bowed.

"Greetings my fair servant, come help me guide Ms.Van Helsing here towards a much more...lively area. I feel as though some merriment would be needed in our coming talks." Draculei replied. Van Helsing still stared bug-eyed at the large boob woman.
15111111.title: The door opens, revealing the Countess.

choices: The next day, Draculei shows Van Helsing around the castle.
151111111.content:
As the three walked through the halls, Van Helsing noticed the designs of a number of rooms in the castle, each seeming to pertain to one of the seven sins. But those were out of the corner of her eye, since Van Helsing couldn't seem to take her eyes of the Countess's bulbous bust. It jiggled and swayed with each step the Countess took.

Eventually, the three arrived at a large green room, filled with trinkets from other countries. Van Helsing assumed this was the Envy room. Renfield stood by the door.

Draculei moved to a large green couch and sat down, her bust resting neatly in her lap. She motioned for Van Helsing to join her, which the professor did.

"So, to what do I owe the honor of the great Sarah Van Helsing visiting my home?" Draculei asked.

"I've heard tell that this land is besieged by creatures of darkness." Van Helsing answered. "Ghouls and demons attacking the townsfolk. I would like to offer my services to rid this land of them."

Missy rolled her eyes as she watched the scene unfold. It was obvious Draculei was one of those creatures. She just wanted to scream at the screen and warn her, but she knew it'd be no use.

"Ah, yes. I've heard those rumors." Draculei replied. "It is quite ghastly what's been happening. I'll gladly take your services. I'll see to it you have a room here to deal with these... creatures."

"Thank you." Van Helsing replied, eyes still glued to the Countess's massive bust. The Countess noticed this and chuckled.
"They are quite marvelous, aren't they?" Draculei said, hefting up her bust. "They began growing some time ago. I must admit, I simply adore them. They are quite soft to the touch. Would you like to feel?"

For a moment, it seemed like Van Helsing would take the offer, but she shook her head.

"No, thank you. I should retire for the evening. If I am to rid your home of these creatures, I need to be well rested." Van Helsing said. The Countess seemed somewhat sad at her offer being turned down, but dismissed it.

"I shall have Renfield take you to a room." Draculei said, before motioning for Renfield to do just that. As Renfield led Van Helsing out, Draculei watched, smiling.
151111111.title: Rumors

1511111111.content:
Van Helsing woke up from her nap nd slowly brought herself up to speed. Missy watched as the woman moved like greased lighting and stepped right back into her bikini armor. Although,this one was colored green instead of her usual read. Now that she thought of it, where was Van Helsing's travel bag?

Anyways, Van Helsing walked out of her room. All across the hallways were strung out guests with gaping mouths with dribbling wine. Van Helsing grimaced at the sight.

"Oh don't mind the guests, they'll be out partying once more." A woman who appeared to be more comly dressed than the animal wearers spoke. Van Helsing's eyebrow raised up. The woman was a mirror of Draculei, in terms of body proportions. Her bust wasn't as monstrous as her mistress,but they passed the realm of normal possibility.

"Alina at your service." She bowed which gave ample view of her cleavage. Van Helsing nodded in acknowledgement.The busty woman gently held her hand out to guide Van Helsing out of the cramped corridors. The two soon stepped into the red room of wrath. What appeared to be a cockfighting ring was placed gently in the corner, while on the other side was a ring for bare knuckle brawling.

"Sorry for your accommodations, all the other wings were booked" Alina spoke. Van Helsing ruffled her hat for a bit as it smacked against a random hand stand.

"No worries, I am just thankful your mistress has given me temporary shelter."Van Helsing responded.The two slowly made their way out from the red room and crossed into a corridor,though all the curtains were up,which made Van Helsing look at Alina for an answer.

"Morning hangovers." was all she said.

The two then walked right and passed an ornate door to be greeted by a small garden. It was surprisingly humble for the large castle-mansion, until Van Helsing realized that it was just another thematic area of Draculei's dwelling. If she had to guess, there were six other gardens just like this.With a pop, Van Helsing looked over to see Alina with a large parasol blocking the sun from her. How she got a parasol so fast, when the professor knew she didn't have one before, Van Helsing didn't bother to ask.

"Hello Alina!" Draculei called out. "And good morning to you Van Helsing!"

A gargantuan parasol blocked the sunlight from Draculei. Still the size strained to cover the well endowed woman, any bigger and it would too cumbersome to be moved at all. The mistress of the castle sat in a chair while Renfield served water to some other lounging guests.

"Would you like a tour of my home to see any kinks in my defenses?" The countess spoke.

With a gruff 'yes', Van Helsing walked forth towards the countess. Alina followed behind with some frugal steps under the sun.
1511111111.title: The Countess: Around the Castle's Lot.

choices: Van Helsing and Draculei get to know each other better.
15111111111.content:
"As you can see, each one of the gardens is designed after one of the Seven Deadly Sins, much like the rooms we passed by last night." Draculei said as the three walked through the gardens. That was something Van Helsing certainly noticed. They had just left a garden with hedges and statures depicting a fierce battle, which Van Helsing guessed was Wrath, and they were now entering a garden with statues of beautiful women of various body shapes in provocative poses.

"I'm to assume this is Lust?" Van Helsing asked, keeping her eyes on the garden itself. She knew that if she looked at Draculei, she'd never take her eyes of the Countess's enormous bust.

"Yes. Of all the sins, Lust is my personal favorite." Draculei answered. "Beauty is something I quite value, and a sin represent that fits me quite well."

Van Helsing did not reply to that. She simply continued to look at the garden. She noticed several servants milling about, but they all seemed... odd. The male servants were quiet and emotionless, while the female servants all seemed more lively. What's more, the female servants all were buxom as well.

The castle tour took the three into a library. It was enormous, and filled with books from various countries.

"I've traveled quite a bit, and have amassed a rather impressive collection of tomes. Perhaps they could be useful in your... work here." Draculei said. There was silence for a moment, before Draculei suddenly moved in front of Van Helsing. Once she did, Van Helsing's eyes instantly fell on Draculei's bust.

"Apologies. I actually quite enjoy the attention my chest gets." Draculei said. "Alina, you may go. I wish to speak with Van Helsing in private."

Alina nodded, before turning and leaving the library.
15111111111.title: Small Tour

choices: The Countess and The Professor Scene 2
151111111111.content:
Van Helsing surveyed the vast room with all of its books that filled the shelves. It was a masterpiece of accumulated works. She was suitably impressed by the countess' efforts.

"Did your family help in collecting all of these artefacts? This seems like several lifetimes worth, even I can't believe you filled these hallways by yourself." Van Helsing spoke. Draculei gave the hunter a small smile at that.

"You could say that,now come, let's see if I have anything for you to look upon." The pale beauty said. "Besides myself of course."

Van Helsing nodded,and with some enthusiasm, walked forth into the vast library. With some interest she could see a few guests studying the tomes here. They had the heads of ravens with yellow patterns, ribbons,and other accoutrements on their person.

"Hrmm. Guests from the greed wing." Draculei whispered. A few woman worked with these guests, almost as if they were scholars in a academic stronghold. One woman though stood out amongst them. She had a great large bust, more grapefruit shaped than the other bosom filled women. In size she was smaller than both Draculei and Alina, though no lest supernaturally busty.

"Solveig, hello dear." Draculei said to the woman. "What guest do we have here?"

"Oh, Lord Beaumont. A Frenchman I believe." Solveig spoke with a hint of a Norse accent upon her tongue.The lord did not wear a raven's head but instead a completely yellow robe like a Grecian. He seemed too entranced by his book to recognize the mistress of the manor.

"Hrm. Tell the poor fellow you'll be out for a bit." Draculei stated. Solveig nodded and talked to the man besides her. He waved her off and so Solveig got up to attend to her lady's need.

"My servant Solveig meet Van Helsing,Van Helsing meet Solveig." Draculei stated. The two exchanged pleasantries."Van Helsing please let my servant help in your search. I need to find a better dress for myself. I'll still be around here, so just give me a small ring of the bell and I'll come and meet you two once more."

With that Draculei walked off leaving the two behind.

"What does she mean she'll be around here?" Van Helsing spoke

"Oh, there are many compartments around the library which allows men and women to quickly undress themselves and call upon different clothing.That and for some nice peace and quiet if they so choose." Solveig said

"Don't they have enough peace here?"

"You'll be surprised how many folk want to please themselves in more private offices. Especially since this library has the largest horde of erotic fiction in Europe or at least the top ten."Solveig said with some pride which made Van Helsing look upon her with shock. "Now come then, let's find your books."
151111111111.title: The Countess and The Professor Scene 1

choices: Van Helsing gets to work reading the books.
1511111111111.content:
As Solveig led Van Helsing through the library, the professor was still in complete awe at the sheer size of it all. The two made their way through the erotic literature section (which was utterly massive), and entered a section dedicated to creatures and monsters.

"Here we are." Solveig said. "I hope that you will find something here that will be of assistance to your work. If you have any questions, you may ask me or any of the other servants."

"There is one thing I wish to understand." Van Helsing said. "I've noticed that many of the women here are exceptionally buxom."

"Ah, yes." Solveig replied. "The mistress has very... particular tastes, as it were. To her, large breasts are the epitome of beauty. Anything less the head sized is unacceptable."

"And how exactly did these women become so buxom?" Van Helsing asked.

"I'm afraid that is my personal secret." The voice of Draculei answered. Van Helsing turned to see the Countess, now clad in a tight purple dress that reached the floor, hiding her feet. Her prodigious bosom was still on display.

"I see." Van Helsing said, once again unable to remove her eyes from Draculei's bust.

"I came to make sure you located the books you need." Draculei said. "I've informed my servants that you are to be given free reign of the manor for your job here. I must, however, say one thing: the east tower is my personal quarters, and unless I invite you there, you are to not enter it."

Missy scoffed as she watched the scene unfold. That was incredibly supicious, so Van Helsing would have to pick up on that.

"Understandable." Van Helsing replied.

"Thank you. Now, I have other matters to attend to. Please enjoy the library. And though I understand your work, I do suggest something from my erotic section. They are simply to die for." Draculei replied, before turning and leaving in the other direction. Her dress hiding her feet made it seem like she was gliding.
1511111111111.title: The Books on Dark Forces

choices: Van Helsing reads all she can, but now must find the monster(s)
15111111111111.content:
"But what about Renfield nevermind." Van Helsing mumbled as she went back to work. The professor prodded around the section as she searched for her required texts. To her surprise Draculei's selection about the local area comprised a total of over twenty different books to Van Helsing's guess. She licked her lips for a moment and brought out three of them. With a swift tuck under her arm, the professor had chosen her first few objects of study.

"I'll be off Solveig." Van Helsing said. "Tell your master I'll be in my room."

"Of course." Solveig stated, with a bow that jiggled breast meat, the woman waved Van Helsing away. The professor stalked out of the hallway and moved back towards her room. Her pace was somewhere between a run and a walk, so in essence, a speed walk.It seemed though the professor had taken a wrong turn as her eyes looked around to find herself within a blue room. Bottles of wine and rubber were placed haphazardly around the room. Men and women wore blue pieces or had cow head's placed upon their crowns.

A woman dance on a table and Van Helsing's eyes widened in surprise.She wore the most provocative clothing ever, so much so it would've been less scandalous if she was nude. The general material of it was silk. Even Missy with her modern tastes blushed in embarrassment. In a time where showing ankles was considered sensual, this piece went above and beyond that.

But that wasn't the only thing, her breasts were enormous.They eclipsed Alina's and Solveig by a wide margin, with only the countess beating the woman out. It must've been painful for her to move this much, yet the ginormous bust woman still danced away.

"What's with this movie and boobs." Missy blushed while she pondered.

"Oi Lads and lassies, Ole' Magdalene is going to do another jig." Magdalene,evidently, declared. With a gentle rumpshack, she did an crotch thrust and began another dance. Van Helsing huffed before she moved out from the den of carnal pleasures.

Now back into another hallway, Van Helsing did her best to formulate a way back to her room.

"Ahem." A voice coughed behind her. The Dutch woman turned her head to spy a woman in what appeared to be a Polish styled men's clothing. It didn't quite fit into it well do to the woman's prodigious bust;Van Helsing's best estimates placed her between Alina and Solveig in size. Unlike the two of them the woman seemed to want to make her breasts seem smaller than they were.

"My name is Dagmara." The woman stated, her brown hair cut short yet feminine.There was a certain tone in her voice though, much more colder than the other two servants were. "How may I assist you?"

"Yes. I would like to be taken back to my room, I have books you see." Van Helsing stated. Dagmara raised an eyebrow but continued on. She asked for Van Helsing's wing,and once answered, barely took a second before she took the professor's hand. With great strides the two shot off until eventually they both arrived back at Van Helsing's room.

"Thank-" Van Helsing looked around but didn't see a trace of the Polish woman.
15111111111111.title: Van Helsing Studies in Her Room

choices: In the Sloth garden, she sees three strange women.
151111111111111.content:
With a sigh, Van Helsing sat on the bed, and grabbed the first of her three books. The book was on the history of the surrounding town. Perhaps there was something on the creatures in it.

As the minutes ticked by, Van Helsing became truly fascinated with the history of the area. It seemed the area, the Carpathian Mountains, were once under the rule of another noble, a count. But he had perished at some point, and the manor came into the ownership of Countess Draculei. Though oddly, Draculei's own history seemed missing from the book.

Van Helsing also read that the area was a breeding ground for vampires, attacking livestock to keep themselves feed on blood. With this confirmation, Van Helsing closed the book, and grabbed the next book.

The minutes turned into hours as Van Helsing read everything in the three books. It was well into the night, and Van Helsing decided it was time to start looking around the manor, to make sure no monsters attacked the people within.

Leaving her room, she began walking the halls of the manor. She could still hear the sounds of partying going on in the various rooms. She decided that if they were still partying, they must have been safe, so she ignored the rooms and went out into the night.
151111111111111.title: A Quick Study

choices: Van Helsing is apprehensive to warn Draculei in case a panic is started
1511111111111111.content:
She stalked past the red room of wrath, where she could hear the merchants and nobility yell vicious jabs at their preferred champion. There was the feeling however that the partying would soon subside as the hour grew longer. Van Helsing didn't care much though for this display of human thirst for blood when there was more supernatural thirst still abound.

Already having visited the lust room, Van Helsing decided she wanted to see some other places in the manor. It being so big, her walk down the hallways felt like they took forever. Missy swore she saw a loop just to make the travel feel even longer than needed.

"How much more of this movie is there?" She questioned. The real life woman picked up the remote to see she was only an hour and twelve minutes in. With only another hour and thirty minutes to go. She paused the video and went up to the store to get some snacks she knew the owner left behind. Outside the storm continued on.

But let's not concern ourselves with her.Back in Van Helsing's timeframe, the professor moved her way until she neared the sloth room. There men and women in pieces of orange with mule masks and insignias walked lazily among each other. The faint smell of hashish and narcotics could be divined through the air. Van Helsing closed her mouth and nose and quickly moved out into its garden, which was by far the largest she could see. It dwarfed the wrath and lust room in size as though it was declaring "can you walk end to end of my quarters?"

Van Helsing saw in one corner three ladies of unnatural paleness to their skin.One had pale-blonde to her locks, another raven,and one startling white.With the signature bosm filled bodies of the countess' court, Van Helsing wouldn't mind them that much. If not for the fact that the white-haired one seemed to be intent to lay on top of two comfortable looking cushions. Which the other two didn't want to sit on themselves and in fact drove away any drugged out guests.

Van Helsing walked casually over to them to listen in on their conversation. she sat down onto an unoccupied cushion near the trio and did her best to appear wanting for some hemp or opium.

"I can't believe you stayed out that long in the sun, could you believe your punishment if you got any bigger than you did? What the master would've thought? You're lucky you shrunk down to this size." One of the two women spoke.

"I apologize for my carelessness, my sisters, I seemed that the drugs took quite a hold of me as well as my prey."

"Quite right. Hopefully by another hour you'll get even smaller, until then we'll have to keep a watch on any of the prey who thinks you'll make a good cushion."

"Prey? I dare think I've found my beast,or in this case,beasts Van Helsing thought.

"Finding everything alright lass?" A voice declared. Van Helsing looked up to see two twin spheres eclipsed her view. The wobbled back to reveal the smiling face of Magdalene.

"Quite alright,just listening in on the nights wing." Van Helsing did her best not to stare at the three, yet it seemed that Magdalene had a keen sense of sight.

"Oi yeah those three over there, oof, troublemakers they are. Yet they do their jobs well." The Irishwoman stated.

"And may in fact be creatures of the night." Van Helsing thought once more.
1511111111111111.title: Secret in the Sloth Garden

choices: Sightings of a massive furry beast
Sightings of a ghost or something more...alive?
151112.content: But why did she come?A
151112.title: It opens in on a village

choices: Van Helsing questions the wolf problems this town had.
1511121.content:
Missy watched as the title crawl passed her eyes, she focused in on the lone horseback traveler as they made their way through a mist filled bog. The gasping water released ghastly sounds.It set the mood quite well, plus the sound of a wolf howling didn't do much to diminish the scene.

The traveler looked upward towards the moon and revealed itself to be the scantily clad Van Helsing. Her eyes dark with a fierce intelligence, though again, in her pseudo-bikini she wasn't that intimidating. With a bleak blink at the camera, Van Helsing charged passed the bog with her horse. In the background the sounds of wolves grew more and more intense.

Suddenly, a snarl crashed into the scene and the speeding shape of a dark beast came rushing out of the thicket behind the bog. Van Helsing,with hawk-like reflexes, threw a dagger at the form. A yelp of a dog echoed before the dark shape rushed back into the overgrowth. Now that she thought of though, Missy wondered what wolves were doing so near a bog. Unless they do live near bogs, in which that case, nevermind.

Van Helsing, meanwhile, didn't seem to contemplate the ecology of wolves. She edged her horse further along the path in an effort to create more distance between her and the pack. A thunder of growls filled the area behind Van Helsing as she rode forth. She soon caught eye of a blinking torch, which made Van Helsing smile in relief.

But that mood was soon broken by the sound of the wolves behind her. She cried out in desperation while her horse breathed heavily. The light soon materialized larger and Van Helsing could see the small township in front of her. With a hearty crie,she pushed her stallion to the limits until it passed the torch and ended up in the middle of town. Just as fast, Van Helsing turned around with her saber to slice through any canine attacker. None came though, through deduction of their paw patterns that Van Helsing saw,the professor could see how their steps looked as though they retreated. It was as if something scared them off.

"I'll need to keep tabs on that situation." Van Helsing mused to herself.
1511121.title: Sightings of a massive furry beast

151113.content: Alright, so where else can this story start?
151113.title: It opens elsewhere.

1511131.content:
Missy watched through the credit roll of the film, barely keeping her eyes open. While it was nice to know who played who, the credits roll was often the most boring part of the movie.

Finally, the credits ended, and the actual film began. There was a panning shot of a massive river, surrounded by trees. Thanks to her geography classes, Missy was able to identify it as the Amazon River.

The scene then faded to a boat on the river. Standing right at the bow of the ship was Van Helsing herself, still clad in her almost-bikini armor. Missy couldn't help but chuckle at this. There was no way an outfit like that would protect Van Helsing from mosquitos and other parasites.

A man dressed as a scientist emerged from a door at the boat's cabin. He seemed to ignore Van Helsing's outfit as he brought her a map.

"We've almost reached the camp, Professor Van Helsing." The scientist said. "Hopefully, there will be someone still there to tell us what happened."

"I have a feeling I already know." Van Helsing replied, looking at the water.
1511131.title: River Trip

15111311.content:
Once the boat breached on the sandy shore, Van Helsing was gently brought down by the scientist looking fellow. The duo were soon followed by a mix of men in women, which swelled the pair into a group of seven. The group walked across the sand, the jungle sounds echoed in the shade caused by the canopy.

Soon they arrived at a camp half-way destroyed. Tents laid wrecked with pieces of broken canoes embedded in some of them.Twelve or so men laid bandaged and moaning. Four nurses worked vigorously to keep them in fair conditions. A burly looking man sat on top of a barrel. Evidence of heavy drinking was scattered around his impromptu seat. He gave the group a hardy wave of acknowledgement.

"Greetings, you must be th-" his words were suddenly stopped by a hiccup."The problem solver our foreman hired.James Morris."

"Dr.Van Helsing." said woman replied.

Van Helsing shook the man's hand and introduced the male scientist as Dr.Maia. A few exchanges of words came from between the trio before they came to the main problem. Around them, the two groups of the uninjured workers and the boat people helped one another out.With the campsite workers going down to the boat to unhook cargo while the boat folk checked on the wounds of the bandaged people.

"You can see the effects of whatever attacked us, now how can you help find the cause?" James questioned.

"Well the first thing I have to do James is see what this beast is." Van Helsing asked. "Now can you describe the beast on the night it attacked you?"

"Beasts" James stressed. "Plural."

"There was more than one?" Dr.Maia questioned. James nodded and proceeded to explain what had happened for the last week or so.One worker named Yuri had spotted the largest creature he had ever seen.'So huge it could eat a man whole' he described it. Curiosity getting the better of some of the men, they walked to shore only to be greeted by a smaller beast that was still a foot taller than the tallest worker they had on duty. It thoroughly thrashed all the men there and left soon after. The next time, the men decided to try and trap the larger monster. With carefully placed fishing nets at each point in the river that was large enough to allow such a big beast in, they waited.

"And I swear on God's name, we caught that blubbery beast!" Jame declared.Yet once they canoed out to drag it back to camp,the second beast had somehow allowed the fatter one out. They were of course attacked, and while deadly on land, the water monster proved much more of a combatant in the water.

With three men heavily busted up in the tryst, they had miraculously canoed back to camp and ran towards dryer land. But they were followed, the smaller beast grabbed ahold of the vacant canoes. It launched them like cruise missiles and landed into multiple tents with the shrapnel hitting many more.

"Which has now left us in this current predicament." James finished."It has only come back three time since then, but thankfully it only injured one or two men per appearance. Lucky me."

Van Helsing rubbed her chin in thought once James' tale had been spoken.
15111311.title: The boat reaches the camp.

choices: A scream makes Van Helsing return to the camp
151113111.content:
After making sure the people at the camp were safe, Van Helsing left the camp and started her investigation. She decided the best place to start was near the water's edge, so she made her way back to the river.

Once she reached the bank of the river, she began looking around to see if she could find a clue. Almost immediately, she did see something: a set of footprints. Two in fact. One seemed to be leaving the water, the other entering it.

As Van Helsing kneeled down to look at them, she noticed that the prints out of the water were deeper in the ground then the ones entering it. She started to assume that it was the heavier creature, until she noticed that both sets of prints looked exactly the same, minus how deep they were.

As she recalled the description of the two creatures given to her, she thought of pufferfish, and how they can inflate to ward of predators.

"Perhaps the two creatures are actually the same creature, but able to inflate." Van Helsing mused. "But why would the creature attack the camp, I wonder."

15431.title: Halloween of Five GE Ladies

154312.content:
Misty stretched her back after her morning jog,in the bed next to her slept Cecelia her girlfriend.The two currently laid themselves in a small bed, though with their proportions it should've been much bigger. The duo's breasts were the large spheres of boob flesh that it would take more than four hands to completely cover just one tit. The couple didn't mind how small their space was though, it made their nightly escapades much easier. Although they did knock each other off the bed in one case of rough foreplay.

"Its six Misty." Cecelia chimed from the bed with a groan. Misty did a small wave, her hoodie soaked with sweat as well as her bust. The two things created a small river of water between themselves. Held together by a special bind, Misty's breasts were packed as close as possible. With a quick tug at her sides, Misty's angled her face away from her bosom so she wouldn't be hit by the slight recoil her breasts did when they were released.

"I keep telling you this is the best time for me. No one can see me run around." Misty replied. Her breaths caused her breasts to briefly expand larger before they shrunk back down. "Getting ready for that little convention being held."

"Why do you need to get ready, its not like a competition or anything. All you have to do is blab and not perv yourself in front of everybody." Cecelia groggily stated. Misty smiled to her girlfriend and waltzed over with her great big bust.

"Perv myself like this?" She asked. The Chinese woman laid her bust across the smaller, yet still large boob, woman on the bed.
-----
At another part of town one woman flex her body as best as she could.

"Hold.Holddd!" Lana screamed out. Her tree-trunk thighs and calves did their best to keep in the air. Her hips strained because of how much pressure she was putting on them. Her foot was pointed like an arrow to the sky.

They looked like plush fat that could easily be used as pillows, but Lana knew that their was muscle strong enough to crush watermelons in her legs. Unfortuantley,she wanted her old flexibility back,not these ridiculous things she had now.The former dancer gasped in relief and in frustration as her balance was lost and she was dumped onto her bum. Which itself had grown a little larger yet was dwarfed by her thighs.

"God darnit." She laughed out. The fat thigh woman had come somewhat to terms with her changed body. Still she wanted those old dance moves she could do when she was smaller. The woman laid down for a few more moments and then pushed herself upwards to get a drink from her small fridge.

Once one of the world's most famous dancers, or at least in the top thirty, Lana had since laid out of public sight. Her swollen thighs,monster calves,and earthquake hips not being something she was proud of.

"The convention is soon and I want to look at least capable of what I could do before." The woman mumbled while she drank from her bottle of water.
154312.title: Three Blue Ladies and Two Athletic Hotties

info.brief_description: A perfect place for lads and ladies of all sizes
info.description:
What can be said of Great Tracts? The university is considered the highest class of the entire region, while the town is considered the most perfect blend of cool forests and calm river beaches. With a population of over two-hundred thousand, and with a rising populace to boot, it seems that town's popularity is ever on the rise. But there have been some concerns with the town's populace. Like how two-thirds of anybody ages seventeen to thirty-two have suffered some minor physical mishaps. Maybe its something in the water, or the air, maybe its the science building acting up, or maybe its that old chemical plant leaking into the fields. Whatever the case, its not that bad...right?

Rules:

Fetishes(If it's not on the list, do not add):
1.All types of expansion/inflation(that includes Fruits in the mix)
1a. On Giant(ess), their size should never exceed one-hundred feet. On berries, the size in both diameter or height should never exceed fifty feet. On inflation, whether they be air or water or what else, the size should never exceed eighty feet.
1b. Multiple fetishes can be mashed together.

2.Shrinkage.
2a. The size should never go below five inches in height.

3. Bendies, or more accurately, flattening or stretchable bodies. Mr. Fantastic or flatman and the like.
3a. Lengths should never exceed three-hundred feet if they're rubber men/women.

4.Balloon girls/guys or anthropomorphic pool toys.

5.Hose stuffing, force feeding,absorption, and all other types of mouth filling.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Both Ladies and Lads can expand in this interactive.
Nudity is a-okay. Don't be too graphic in that though.
Methods of expansion, whether they be from sight, or sound, or even allergies, doesn't matter.
Expansion* is permanent in all cases except: Breast Expansion, Berrisim, and Ballooning.
A. Breast Expansion should only cut down ten inches all around every milking session.
B. Berrisim should always shrink an afflicted down, unless stated otherwise. It should also lead towards permanent flexibility.
C. Ballooning does/does not lead to flattening, depending on the writer's preference.
Spelling and grammar should both be at an acceptable level of comprehension.
A chapter should have at least 1100 in characters.
*That are not triggered-as in from allergies or sight or sound,etc.

EDIT: 9/15/20
Bendies can now be over 500ft in length.
Weight Gain men and women can't be over 3,000 pounds.
Maximum Age is now 35 Years Old.
Giantess can now be over 200 ft in height.
Shrinking can be under 3 inches in height.
